aws_encryption_sdk.key_providers.baseÂ¶

Base class interface for Master Key Providers.

Classes

MasterKey

Parent interface for Master Key classes.

MasterKeyConfig(key_id)

Configuration object for MasterKey objects.

MasterKeyProvider

Parent interface for Master Key Provider classes.

MasterKeyProviderConfig()

Provides a common ancestor for MasterKeyProvider configuration objects and a stand-in point if common params are needed later.
class aws_encryption_sdk.key_providers.base.MasterKeyProviderConfigÂ¶

Bases: object

Provides a common ancestor for MasterKeyProvider configuration objects and a stand-in point if common params are needed later.

class aws_encryption_sdk.key_providers.base.MasterKeyProviderÂ¶

Bases: object

Parent interface for Master Key Provider classes.

Parameters

config (aws_encryption_sdk.key_providers.base.MasterKeyProviderConfig) â Configuration object

Set key index and member set for all new instances here to avoid requiring child classes to call super init.

vend_masterkey_on_decrypt = TrueÂ¶

Determines whether a MasterKeyProvider attempts to add a MasterKey on decrypt_data_key call.

abstract property provider_idÂ¶

String defining provider ID.

Note

Must be implemented by specific MasterKeyProvider implementations.

master_keys_for_encryption(encryption_context, plaintext_rostream, plaintext_length=None)Â¶

Returns a set containing all Master Keys added to this Provider, or any member Providers, which should be used to encrypt data keys for the specified data.

Note

This does not necessarily include all Master Keys accessible from this Provider.

Note

The Primary Master Key is the first Master Key added to this Master Key Provider and is the Master Key which will be used to generate the data key.

Warning

If plaintext_rostream seek position is modified, it must be returned before leaving method.

Parameters

  • encryption_context (dict) â Encryption context passed to client

  • plaintext_rostream (aws_encryption_sdk.internal.utils.streams.ROStream) â Source plaintext read-only stream

  • plaintext_length (int) â Length of source plaintext (optional)

Returns

Tuple containing Primary Master Key and List of all Master Keys added to this Provider and any member Providers

Return type

tuple containing aws_encryption_sdk.key_providers.base.MasterKey and list of aws_encryption_sdk.key_providers.base.MasterKey

Parameters

decrypt_data_key(encrypted_data_key, algorithm, encryption_context)Â¶

Iterates through all currently added Master Keys and Master Key Providers to attempt to decrypt data key.

Parameters

  • encrypted_data_key (aws_encryption_sdk.structures.EncryptedDataKey) â Encrypted data key to decrypt

  • algorithm (aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.Algorithm) â Algorithm object which directs how this Master Key will encrypt the data key

  • encryption_context (dict) â Encryption context to use in encryption

Returns

Decrypted data key

Return type

aws_encryption_sdk.structures.DataKey

Raises

DecryptKeyError â if unable to decrypt encrypted data key

decrypt_data_key_from_list(encrypted_data_keys, algorithm, encryption_context)Â¶

Receives a list of encrypted data keys and returns the first one which this provider is able to decrypt.

Parameters

  • encrypted_data_keys (list of aws_encryption_sdk.structures.EncryptedDataKey) â List of encrypted data keys

  • algorithm (aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.Algorithm) â Algorithm object which directs how this Master Key will encrypt the data key

  • encryption_context (dict) â Encryption context to use in encryption

Returns

Decrypted data key

Return type

aws_encryption_sdk.structures.DataKey

Raises

DecryptKeyError â if unable to decrypt any of the supplied encrypted data keys

master_keys_for_encryption(encryption_context, plaintext_rostream, plaintext_length=None)Â¶

Returns self and a list containing self, to match the format of output for a Master Key Provider.

Warning

If plaintext_stream seek position is modified, it must be returned before leaving method.

Parameters

  • encryption_context (dict) â Encryption context passed to client

  • plaintext_rostream (aws_encryption_sdk.internal.utils.streams.ROStream) â Source plaintext read-only stream

  • plaintext_length (int) â Length of source plaintext (optional)

Returns

Tuple containing self and a list of self

Return type

tuple containing aws_encryption_sdk.key_providers.base.MasterKey and list of aws_encryption_sdk.key_providers.base.MasterKey

encrypt_data_key(data_key, algorithm, encryption_context)Â¶

Encrypts a supplied data key.

Parameters

  • data_key (aws_encryption_sdk.structures.RawDataKey or aws_encryption_sdk.structures.DataKey) â Unencrypted data key

  • algorithm (aws_encryption_sdk.identifiers.Algorithm) â Algorithm object which directs how this Master Key will encrypt the data key

  • encryption_context (dict) â Encryption context to use in encryption

Returns

Data key containing encrypted data key

Return type

aws_encryption_sdk.structures.EncryptedDataKey

Raises

IncorrectMasterKeyError â if Data Keyâs key provider does not match this Master Key
